content.p: Moodle is our virtual learning environment whether you're studying in the UK, China or Malaysia. This is a central point to access teaching and learning resources for all of your: Login to Moodle Student enquiry centre You can login to Moodle using your university username and password. The service is available the day after you've completed online registration. For help with using Moodle, visit our Moodle help page for students.
